channel.title: Trucking Tuesday – Chow Down Orlando
channel.description: Exploring all that Orlando has to offer.

item.title: The Crooked Spoon
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
Carla posted about the First Church Festival the other day which was our first encounter with The Crooked Spoon. The one thing missing from that review was the 420 Burger. It was missing for two reasons: 1) the picture I took came out awful and 2) I was looking forward to having it again to […]

The post The Crooked Spoon appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
Carla posted about the First Church Festival the other day which was our first encounter with The Crooked Spoon. The one thing missing from that review was the 420 Burger. It was missing for two reasons: 1) the picture I took came out awful and 2) I was looking forward to having it again to truly give it justice.

The Crooked Spoon has two burgers on their menu, the Crooked Spoon and the 420. The Crooked Spoon may be their namesake, but the 420 is my favorite burger in town. Hands down. It’s delicious.

The burger starts with angus beef and is topped with a honey mustard aoli, pineapple relish, swiss cheese and the creme de la creme, candied bacon. All of this is packed into a delicious brioche bun. If this sounds sweet, it is. There’s a nice sweet flavor that comes with the burger that makes it taste like candy – the candied bacon obviously helps. It is so good.

As Carla mentioned the other day, their Six Cheese Mac and Cranberry Turkey are also delicious, but for me, it’s all about the burger.

You can find The Crooked Spoon on Twitter.

The post The Crooked Spoon appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
